title: Another instance of lol is already running do you wish to terminate it? game breaking bug
body: so every time i try to open lol this error will come up and prevent my launcher from starting. I have tried going into task manager to close down any league running in the back round but as soon as i click launch again nothing will happen and 2 lol patcher.exe programs will open, if i click launch again the previous error will come back. Help pls i am unable to play league. I have already tried reinstalling it but nothing seems to work

replies.body: It looks like the patcher is already trying to load but something is blocking it, so when you try again it will notify you that it's already trying.  Poor thing.  Let's give it a hand by making sure your OS is allowing the patcher permission to launch.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make that a reality.  Hope that helps!

Hello Roque,
Have you tried launching the game as administrator?

* Right click the LOL icon on your desktop
* In the menu that pops-up, click "run as admin"
* You most likely will be prompted by a second window for permission to run the application, click yes/run 

If this doesn't work, or you have further questions, feel free to reply!

~tseihei~
i have tried this but still no fix :(
